info.title: IoTSpacesClient
info.description: Use this API to manage the IoTSpaces service instances in your Azure subscription.

get.description: Lists all of the available IoTSpaces service REST API operations.
Get all the IoTSpaces instances in a subscription.

200.description: This is a synchronous operation. The body contains a JSON-serialized array of the metadata from all the IoTSpaces instances in the subscription.

post.description: Check if an IoTSpaces instance name is available.

requestBody.description: Set the name parameter in the OperationInputs structure to the name of the IoTSpaces instance to check.

200.description: This is a synchronous operation. The body contains a JSON-serialized response that specifies whether the IoTSpaces service name is available. If the name is not available, the body contains the reason.

get.description: Get all the IoTSpaces instances in a resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the IoTSpaces instance.

200.description: This is a synchronous operation. The body contains a JSON-serialized array of the metadata from all the IoTSpaces instances in the resource group.

get.description: Get the metadata of a IoTSpaces instance.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the IoTSpaces instance.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the IoTSpaces instance.

200.description: The body contains all the non-security properties of the IoTSpaces instance. Security-related properties are set to null.

put.description: Create or update the metadata of an IoTSpaces instance. The usual pattern to modify a property is to retrieve the IoTSpaces instance metadata and security metadata, and then combine them with the modified values in a new body to update the IoTSpaces instance.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the IoTSpaces instance.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the IoTSpaces instance.

requestBody.description: The IoTSpaces instance metadata and security metadata.

200.description: This is returned as a response to the status polling request for the create or update operation. The body contains the resource representation that indicates a transitional provisioning state.

202.description: Accepted - Put request accepted; the operation will complete asynchronously.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the IoTSpaces instance.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the IoTSpaces instance.

200.description: This is returned as a response to the status polling request for the delete operation. The body contains the resource representation that indicates a transitional provisioning state.

202.description: Accepted - Delete request accepted; the operation will complete asynchronously.

204.description: Once the long running delete operation completes successfully, a 204 No Content status code is returned when the status polling request finds the IoTSpaces service metadata in the service and the status of the delete operation is set to a completed state.

patch.description: Update the metadata of a IoTSpaces instance.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the IoTSpaces instance.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the IoTSpaces instance.

requestBody.description: The IoTSpaces instance metadata and security metadata.

200.description: This is returned as a response to the status polling request for the create or update operation. The body contains the resource representation that indicates a transitional provisioning state.

202.description: Accepted - Put request accepted; the operation will complete asynchronously.

target.description: The target of the particular error.

IoTSpacesDescription.description: The description of the IoTSpaces service.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of IoTSpaces description objects.

value.description: A list of IoTSpaces description objects.

IoTSpacesDescriptionListResult.description: A list of IoTSpaces description objects with a next link.

nameAvailable.description: The value which indicates whether the provided name is available.

IoTSpacesNameAvailabilityInfo.description: The properties indicating whether a given IoTSpaces service name is available.

IoTSpacesPatchDescription.description: The description of the IoTSpaces service.

IoTSpacesProperties.description: The properties of an IoTSpaces instance.

IoTSpacesSkuInfo.description: Information about the SKU of the IoTSpaces instance.

OperationDisplay.description: The object that represents the operation.

name.description: The name of the IoTSpaces service instance to check.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of IoTSpaces description objects.

value.description: A list of IoT spaces operations supported by the Microsoft.IoTSpaces resource provider.

OperationListResult.description: A list of IoTSpaces service operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

Resource.description: The common properties of an IoTSpaces service.

connectionString.description: The connection string of the storage account.

containerName.description: The name of storage container in the storage account.

resourceGroup.description: The name of the resource group of the storage account.

subscriptionId.description: The subscription identifier of the storage account.

StorageContainerProperties.description: The properties of the Azure Storage Container for file archive.

resourceGroupName.name: resourceGroupName
resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group that contains the IoTSpaces instance.

resourceName.name: resourceName
resourceName.description: The name of the IoTSpaces instance.
